description:
Description :
        The young orphan Moeko is hopelessly in love with her cousin and guardian, Mariya. What about Mariya? How does he feel about Moeko? Passion, obsession, and forbidden love: A highly dangerous combination.

In the Kindan seies:

V.1 - Himitsu no Hanazono (Secret Garden)

V.2 - Ano Natsunohi no Rakuen (Summer Paradise)

V.3 - Sono Ude no Naka no Tengoku

V.4 - Kono Mune ni Aru Honoo

V.5 - Bara no Kanata (Beyond the Rose)
